text: Ousseini Djibo Idrissa (born 28 December 1998) is a Nigerien sprinter. He competed in the men's 400 metres at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerien male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Niger Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ousseini Djibo Idrissa
